result.name: Vim Config
result.summary: My contributions to the Vim ecosystem.
result.description:
When I started using Vim as my primary editor I found my second love. Its pure efficiency combined with its extendability have yet to leave me seriously wanting for any features. I previously maintained a fork of the popular spf13-vim distribution. I have since abandoned that fork and created my own .vimrc which is hosted with my dotfiles.

I have also ported the default Powerline theme to the powerlineish theme in the vim-airline project.
